column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I'm from CA and last month I traveled to Chicago on Business.  Lou Malnati's was the first place I went to straight from the airport.  It was my first time trying real Chicago Deep Dish pizza.  It was nothing I had imagined but better than I expected.  Considering i'm not from Chicago
column2: I always thought of Deep Dish Pizza as a pizza with a really thick crust and tons of bread.  This was not the case at all.  To my surprise
column3: Lou Malnati's had the perfect amount of crust (not thick at all) and the massive amount of cheese and meat was impressive.  Full of flavor.  I wish we had a Lou Malnati's in the LA area.  Now i'm just hoping my manager sends me to Chicago again.  Delicious!
